
32'b000000000000_00000_010_00000_0000011;//lw rs0 0(s0)

a[0]=32'b0000000_00001_00000_000_00001_0010011;  //addi rs1 rs0 1
a[1]=32'b0000000_00001_00000_000_00010_0110011;  //ADD rs2 rs0 rs1
a[2]=32'b0000000_00001_00000_010_00011_0110011;  //slt rs3 rs0 rs1
a[3]=32'b0000000_00001_00000_110_00100_0110011;  //or  rs4 rs0 rs1	
a[4]=32'b0000000_00000_00000_010_00101_0000011;  //lw  rs5 rs0 0 
a[5]=32'b0000000_00000_00101_000_00001_0110011;  //add rs1 rs5 rs0 
a[6]=32'b0000000_00000_00101_000_00010_0110011;  //add rs2 rs5 rs0 
a[7]=32'b0000000_00010_00000_010_00001_0100011;  //sw  rs0 rs2 1
a[8]=32'b0000000_00010_00000_001_00100_1100011;  //bne rs0 rs2 4;
a[9]=32'b0000000_00000_00000_000_00000_0000000;   //empty
a[12]=32'b0000000_00001_00000_000_00000_0010011;   //addi rs0 rs0 1;
